specialServices.name: Jungle Safari
specialServices.description: Guided jeep safari including pick-up and drop-off to your resort and entry tickets. Up to 6 people allowed per jeep.

specialServices.name: 7 Points Sightseeing
specialServices.description: 5-6 hour sightseeing tour covering Jhabng, Bindu, Samsing, Suntalakhola, Rocky Island, LaEguras & Murti River in a small car.

specialServices.name: Lava-Delo or Lava-Rishop Sightseeing
